It’s investing time.

arrow_back

arrow_back Do you want to create a personal or an organisational account?

help_outline

Personal Account

Organisational Account

Differences between a Personal and an Organisational account:

Personal Account
  • - Tax rate on interest received: 28%
  • - Investment limit:
  • 3000€ per project
  • 10.000€ per year
(unless you're a Qualified Investor or have an annual income higher than 70.000€)
Organisational Account
  • - Tax rate on interest received: 25%
  • - No investment limits
  • - We will need some documents from you:
  • Shareholder Declaration
  • Legal Representative ID document
  • Articles of Association
  • Registration Proof
Agree
